prompt: Develop a recently viewed products page with a light pastel background (soft beige) and a flat app bar with the title 'Recently Viewed' in bold navy text. The page should feature a horizontal scrollable list of product cards with rounded edges and a slight border. Each card should have a white background, containing a circular product image placeholder (light grey with a shopping bag icon) at the top, followed by centered product details. The product details should include the product name in bold navy text, a short description in grey text, the current price in bold green, and the original price crossed out in red. Place an 'Add to Cart' button with a navy background and white text at the bottom center of each card. Use minimal padding for a compact layout.
